snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio of New York spoke on the political appeal of Senator Rand Paul of Kentucky, who he cited as a chief threat to Democratic presidential prospects in 2016.
abstract: Mayor Bill de Blasio of New York spoke on the political appeal of Senator Rand Paul of Kentucky, who he cited as a chief threat to Democratic presidential prospects in 2016.

headline.main: Verbatim: De Blasio on Rand Paul
